mapper.update: { CALL vk.vp_f_pa.erstellen_kdvtdok_records( in_kdvt_id => #{IN_KDVT_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_sort_wemf => #{IN_SORT_WEMF, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_dokument_format => #{IN_DOKUMENT_FORMAT, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_drucker_alias => #{IN_DRUCKER_ALIAS, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , in_anz_exemplare => #{IN_ANZ_EXEMPLARE, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_rekapitulation => #{IN_MIT_REKAPITULATION, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_verteilung_plan => #{IN_MIT_VERTEILUNG_PLAN, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_adressliste => #{IN_MIT_ADRESSLISTE, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_spr_bewertung => #{IN_MIT_SPR_BEWERTUNG, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_spr_xml_datei => #{IN_MIT_SPR_XML_DATEI, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_wm_bedarf => #{IN_MIT_WM_BEDARF, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_shortcut_fs => #{IN_MIT_SHORTCUT_FS, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_ausstrahlungsplan => #{IN_MIT_AUSSTRAHLUNGSPLAN, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_direktdruck => #{IN_DIREKTDRUCK, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_vp_typ_traffic => #{IN_VP_TYP_TRAFFIC, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_drucksteuerung_traffic => #{IN_DRUCKSTEUERUNG_TRAFFIC, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_spr_xml_opt_jn => #{IN_SPR_XML_OPT_JN, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_is_myapgsga_erlaubt => #{IN_IS_MYAPGSGA_ERLAUBT, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_nur_brutto => #{IN_NUR_BRUTTO, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_mit_kontaktwert => #{IN_MIT_KONTAKTWERT, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , in_drucklayout => #{IN_DRUCKLAYOUT, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , out_vk_pap_drucken => #{OUT_VK_PAP_DRUCKEN, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) }
